ABSTRACT

 

instructions to the single-chip microcomputer STC8F2K08S to control the rotation direction of the small wheel and the switching state of the sprayer and the light. It can also be set in the car control application APP. The state of the car movement trajectory, spray and lighting is automatically running.This graduation is a design of an intelligent spray car based on a single-chip microcomputer, which aims to improve work efficiency, prevent harm and improve quality of life. This graduation takes the communication circuit of the STC8F2K08S chip and WiFi module as the core, and writes an Android APP to control the car. Through the design of single-chip microcomputer STC8F2K08S serial port communication, it enables the ESP8266 WiFi module to complete the initialization design and communicate with the single-chip microcomputer STC8F2K08S, and connect the ESP8266WiFi module to the mobile phone, and finally the written car control should Control the car with PP. When the forward, backward, left, instructions to the single-chip microcomputer STC8F2K08S to control the rotation direction of the small wheel and the switching state of the sprayer and the light. It can also be set in the car control application APP. The state of the car movement trajectory, spray and lighting is automatically running.

The physical verification results prove that the design can effectively meet the design requirements, has good stability and reliability, and has certain application value.

Key words :Intelligent spraying trolley;STC8F2K08S£» Control; spray

//---------¶¨ÒåÍ¨ÐÅ»º³åÇø1µÄÇå¿Õº¯Êý-----------

void CLR_Buf1(void)

{  unsigned char k;

    for(k=0;k<Buf_Max1;k++)    

   { Rec_Buf1[k] = 0;}

    i1 = 0;     }

    for(k=0;k<Buf_Max2;k++)    

   {Rec_Buf2[k] = 0;}

    i2 = 0;  }

}ES =  1;}

void Uart2() interrupt 8 using 1

{  IE2 = 0x00;

    if (S2CON & S2RI)

    {    S2CON &= ~S2RI;

    if (S2CON & S2TI){S2CON &= ~S2TI;}
